item.title: Nicole add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Our real discoveries come from chaos, from going to the place that looks wrong and stupid and foolish." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I don't want to die without any scars." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "That was the thing about words, they were clear and specific-chair, eye, stone- but when you talked about feelings, words were too stiff, they were this and not that, they couldn't include all the meanings. In defining, they always left something out." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "In a perverse way, I was glad for the stitches, glad it would show, that there would be scars. What was the point in just being hurt on the inside? It should bloody well show." -- Janet Fitch
